songs.title: Scorpio Season Intro
songs.lyrics:
Ladies and gentlemen
Scorpio Season has began
USA
Scorpio Season has began
Scorpio Season has began
This is the season for the truest to step forward
You see me cause
Two time, one time for the more ho
Let's get it
Shout to my little T family
Leezy
Peace to the gat
Ki 1, Murf Durf
City Spuff
Shout to the whole motherf*ckin WT Cap one time
Stay in line
Little San Louis, I see you
Shout out to the whole JGE Cap one time
Retro in the building one time
Pop easy, I got love
Aye V, I see you
It's no reason to explain why I'm the shit
Scorpio Season
Better act like you know
